titleStmt.title: A geographicall and historicall disqvisition touching the Asia properly so called, the Lydian Asia (which is the Asia so often mentioned in the New Testament), the Proconsular Asia, and the Asian Diocese by James Ussher.
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
